title: I am qualifying for the RPSC (Rajasthan Public Service Commission), 2021. I am 20 now, and I will be 21 by 8th April 2021. Am I eligible to sit? - Quora

response.answer_text: Age cutoff date will be written in advertisement.but,the problem is that thete is no consistency of employment with rpsc.last year form was available In2019 and still its final result is not available,so you will have to see if it will be available in 2021,try for uppsc and bpsc.they have upto dated calender,all the best
